title: Jating
author: Jating
content: Anyone seen the River commercial about Bitcoin?Although obviously they are promoting River, a client-first Bitcoin-only financial institution, but they manage to explain BTC clearly. And the best pitch?“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Yep that's a good message, instead of giving a sweet promise, they choose for being realistic. Sadly the video has been posted since a month ago, but it didn't even reach 1K views.While these stupid videos gets so many views, viewers really likes when someone talk about conspiracy and get rich quick through futures trading.

comments.author: balotelli
comments.body: I really like this quote: “Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly; it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation.” I urgently need answers to two questions. First, if one day you become rich quickly, what will you do? And second, if one day you find yourself in a poor situation, will you hate Bitcoin?

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on July 23, 2024, 08:38:32 AMYep that's a good message, instead of giving a sweet promise, they choose for being realistic. Sadly the video has been posted since a month ago, but it didn't even reach 1K views.Yeah, people don't like to face reality despite being obvious, they prefer to be mislead by paying attention to what they want to believe. To pull crowd in social media nowadays is not by being realistic, as far as you know how to tell a convincing lies your channel will be the most viewed one.Quote from: Jating on July 23, 2024, 08:11:53 AM“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”That's old belief to the new folks in the industry. The attention has been shifted from hedging against inflation to money making machine. That's their perception of crypto in general, hence, it is a scam when the reality hit them.

comments.author: Catenaccio
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on July 23, 2024, 08:11:53 AM“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”Fiat currencies are inflationary at very high rates but Bitcoin is inflationary too. The thing makes Bitcoin better than fiat currencies is it has only 21 millions cap that means with time, inflation rate will become smaller every 210,000 blocks (about four years). After 2140, it will become deflationary but I don't hope to live till that year.Same total supply, population continue to grow, demand on Bitcoin will grow, it will help price.Controlled supplyHow is the 21 million bitcoin cap defined and enforcedMore people read The bullish case for Bitcoin[url], understand it and take action, price will grow more.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: Really it has become obvious that the printed centralized monies are quite fading out and the USD has only been able to secure a minimum value due to its centralized global affiliations with other local currencies.Inflation is becoming an occurrence of disasters which we labours hardly and earns hugely but yet we it can not sustain us because goods and services are competing like  it can not be affordable by monies and the government are also there acting daylight robbery on the public with over taxes like when you are working for yourself, you are likely working for the government too by remittance of taxes which is being dedicated by purchases and transaction charges.All these actually happens because we lives in the circle of Centralized policies but then, we can always have this game of the governments changed if we foresees to adopt the decentralized blockchains by which we controls our funds by ourselves with minimal taxes with the potentials of increasing the values of our funds if we can consolidate to adopt Bitcoin and weigh to straighten the values of our funds and assets on the Bitcoin.Earlier the best the better for to realize that Bitcoin is built to have our assets and funds valuable in its decentralized digital technology and to also fascinating of transactions.Behold, this is something the government will not want us to know even as we all falls victims to the inflations but why? Simply because they hedges their values on your income throw extractions of taxes while under their watch of centralized commodities.Ummm...  I tried to visit this riv.com website but says it can not be reached. I would be interested to know more about them pertaining their utmost interests on this Bitcoin with their speculations.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on July 23, 2024, 09:06:36 AMI really like this quote: “Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly; it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation.” I urgently need answers to two questions. First, if one day you become rich quickly, what will you do? And second, if one day you find yourself in a poor situation, will you hate Bitcoin?1. I will do nothing, why you need to have "reason" to get rich or when you have x amount of money? this is why people most people can't being rich because for being rich, high salary jobs and successful investment aren't enough, you need to understand how to protect your wealth.When they have money, they buy big house, car, luxury lifestyle, party everyday, luxury clothes etc, these will not make your wealth to grow.2. Let's say someone DCA-ing Bitcoin and use all of the money only to invest in Bitcoin, turns out Bitcoin price drop to $1. There's no one in the world will not cry and not blame Bitcoin. Investment is always talk about profit, no one want to loss.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on July 23, 2024, 09:06:36 AMI really like this quote: “Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly; it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation.” I urgently need answers to two questions. First, if one day you become rich quickly, what will you do? And second, if one day you find yourself in a poor situation, will you hate Bitcoin?Yeah, I do agree, it's a old adage but we all know that it really go straight to our (hearts and) mind when we hear that and that's why most of us are into Bitcoin. They continuously printing money and then it's losses its value in our hand.While in Bitcoin, regardless on how you accumulate, it could be DCA or one time buy and then you just hold or wait for our dip to buy, not a get rich scheme, but in the future it will give us financial freedom and we have a weapon in our hands against inflation.

comments.author: Supianto
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on July 23, 2024, 08:38:32 AMYep that's a good message, instead of giving a sweet promise, they choose for being realistic. Sadly the video has been posted since a month ago, but it didn't even reach 1K views.While these stupid videos gets so many views, viewers really likes when someone talk about conspiracy and get rich quick through futures trading.https://imgvb.com/images/2024/07/23/431e087f8727c76f43e86df17a4bc4f3.pngYeah, I still don't get why do they have so many viewers. They are almost always wrong and talk about the same stuff every day. And have absolutely disgusting thumbnails.

comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on July 23, 2024, 08:11:53 AM“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”That's the truth. Perhaps there are still people out there who think that Bitcoin is a way to get rich quickly and need to understand that this is wrong.A good message doesn't always have to be in a serious advertising package, it needs to be tailored. Sometimes useful advertisements have to be packaged in a comedic way so that they are remembered because they are funny.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: This is a really good commercial. Short and straight forward. In just a minute, they were able to explain why you should buy bitcoin in the simplest form possible and managed to advertise their services.One of the most impressive commercials of recent times would be one from coinbase. It’s very engaging, fun and creative and most importantly it captures the essence of bitcoin which is decentralization.It doesn’t matter much to me if they are advertising their own platform as long as they can educate a larger audience and attract more investors.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on July 23, 2024, 09:06:36 AMI really like this quote: “Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly; it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation.” I urgently need answers to two questions. First, if one day you become rich quickly, what will you do? And second, if one day you find yourself in a poor situation, will you hate Bitcoin?It is a simple but powerful message. It summarizes Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and also has some lessons for those who assume that Bitcoin is a get-rich-quick investment. I have adopted this quote as a way to educate and silence critics.Quote from: Supianto on July 23, 2024, 11:02:13 AMYeah, I still don't get why do they have so many viewers. They are almost always wrong and talk about the same stuff every day. And have absolutely disgusting thumbnails.People like viewing channels that promise to make them rich within a few days. Maybe River should also consider promoting the advertisement because it contains information that the public needs. If you have a video titled "How I made millionaires Bitcoin in a few days" people will rush to view it, especially if you do some publicity.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on July 23, 2024, 08:11:53 AM“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”That's a great slogan, love it. And about the company I think is a big risk to only operate with bitcoin because they will be affected by the market cap. If bitcoin price drops 70% the impact in the company will be huge, only time will show us how they act in the had times.I will read more about the company, i'm curious about the logic behind the business.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on July 23, 2024, 08:11:53 AM“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”They have both done well in pitching up their own concern on how they feel concerning bitcoin in relation to other currency and doing this in public, this is one of the reason why most of us all can go for bitcoin adoption, because we have realized the fact that inflation with fiat currencies will only lead to a gradual poverty, because there were no escape routes out of it since the entire system is not perfect enough as they continue to print fiat, while bitcoin have limited supply.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Nice quote, it's not that hard to understand when we're talking about it to people who like to listen to financial advice. Now, this is a financial advice although it's not obliging people to invest in Bitcoin but they're having an idea of what Bitcoin is to us and how it will play a vital part to their finances today and in the future.Quote from: Apocollapse on July 23, 2024, 08:38:32 AMWhile these stupid videos gets so many views, viewers really likes when someone talk about conspiracy and get rich quick through futures trading.They keep on growing like mushrooms and expect that there will be more of these content creators to come when Bitcoin hits a new all-time high. We will be having a lot of Bitcoin-crypto experts again once it happens.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Another company that takes the bitcoin flag as its own, never explains (100%) that bitcoin is decentralized, it names what suits it... 21 million, etc. but the dollar that brought them to found River.com is bad,...I would like to be a member but of River...River Plate, it costs a few dollars.Hey, I have nothing against this company, everyone invests and uses the services that suit them... anyway, a commercial that puts it on the crypto service list, just that...

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: Jating on July 23, 2024, 08:11:53 AMAnyone seen the River commercial about Bitcoin?Although obviously they are promoting River, a client-first Bitcoin-only financial institution, but they manage to explain BTC clearly. And the best pitch?“Bitcoin isn’t about getting rich quickly, it’s about not getting poor slowly through inflation”Man that is tight we made it to the era of Bitcoin commercials on TV. Its still so new since the ETFs commercials flooded the superbowl commercials. Soon there will be whole channels revolving around bitcoin. Side note, could you imagine if we had like a bitcoin version of youtube thats all about bitcoin videos. BTC history channel, BTC in sports lol , Mining software, the hardware show haha, The exchange show I mean shoot there could be so many channels, this would be fun to watch.
